title: On the Fontaine-Mazur conjecture for $p=3$
abstract:
In this article, we prove some new cases of the Fontaine-Mazur conjecture on
two-dimensional Galois representations when $p=3$. Combining the previous work,
we can conclude the conjecture in the regular case when $p$ is an odd prime.
Our result is a sequel to Pan's work, based on some recent progress on $p$-adic
Langlands correspondence and Galois deformation theory.
